remarks: The base set of a constructed metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Aug-2015.)
statement:
setsms.x $e |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) $.
setsms.d $e |- ( ph -> D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) $.
setsms.k $e |- ( ph -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) $.
setsmsbas $p |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
